E.A.T PROLOGUE

AKNP-0014

"The beginning of a new story……
A building flying through the sky, a girl who lost her light, and a black bird.
The curtain now opens on the endless journey of 'A'."

mothy's seventeenth album featuring three new tracks and their off-vocals released on August 27, 2020. The album is licensed through KARENT and is available on Apple Music, Amazon, and Spotify.

Trailer · Crossfade · Playlist

Tracklist

  1. grEAT journey
  2. Blind Girl and Angel
  3. Song of the Cowardly Black Bird
  4. grEAT journey (Off Vocal Version)
  5. Blind Girl and Angel (Off Vocal Version)
  6. Song of the Cowardly Black Bird (Off Vocal Version)

Notes

  • The album was illustrated by mothy.
  • This album was mothy's first to have an initial digital-only release.
  • Physical copies of the album were bundled with the short story E.A.T PROLOGUE.
